[@microsoft/fast-element](../fast-element/index.html) &gt; [nullableBooleanConverter](../fast-element.nullablebooleanconverter/index.html)

## nullableBooleanConverter variable

A [ValueConverter](../fast-element.valueconverter/) that converts to and from `boolean` values. `null`<!-- -->, `undefined`<!-- -->, `""`<!-- -->, and `void` values are converted to `null`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
nullableBooleanConverter: ValueConverter
```
